name: Task Wan - Task Management
description:
Task Wan isn't the most powerful to-do list out there. It's also not the simplest. That's kind of the point: this app balances power with simplicity, and it does so while running on basically every platform that exists. Task Wan is flexible enough to adapt to most workflows but not so complicated as to overwhelm.


The UI Kit leverages all Figma features, including design system, typography, iconography.
